turkish_example_sentence: Sen pazarda taze meyveyi bulamamışsan, sağlıklı yemek yiyemezdin.
english_example_sentence: If you had not found the fresh fruit at the market, you could not have eaten healthy food.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не нашел свежие фрукты на рынке, ты не смог бы есть здоровую пищу.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen pazarda taze meyveyi ______, sağlıklı yemek yiyemezdin.
